p: Territory of Washington vs. Mary Arlington and Territory of Washington vs. Tomothy Johnston} Recognizance

Comes now on this 30th January A.D. 1885 the above named defendants Mary Arlington in her own proper person, and Timothy Johnson in his own proper person; and in open court, each for themselves, recognize and acknowledge themselves severally and each of their heirs, executors and administrators severally, bound unto the Territory of Washington in the sum of Two hundred Dollars lawful money for the payment of which well and truly to be made, they severally bind
